author: Tim Kroupa
comment: Absolutely gorgeous, and love the customization options.  Keep it up!  My only wish is that there were separate options to customize ambient mode.  I would prefer ambient to look like the image above labelled ambient or the minimal one, instead of the same as active in black & white.  Also, the temperature is lower on watch and hangs partly out of the window.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Tim... Yeah im in the process of doing a review of this one, stay tuned as i get more options into it...

title: Beautiful

author: Twisted World
comment: Instead of the nice trapizoid shaped weather "window", I just get some random 9-digit number that is all over the place and totally messing up the nice design. Unfortunately it took me too freakin' long to get the face to appear on my watch in the first place that I could not get a refund anymore. This really sucks!

comment: Weather bubble incomplete on moto 360.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up David, that bubble will come back.. give it  a day, im sure you'll be fine. If not lets consider a re-install: http://www.tha-icon.com/help/cant-install-the-watch-face/ thx for the comments.

title: Holy cow

author: mark Johnson
comment: I paid for this watch face & It doesn't show up anywhere on my phone? Very frustrating!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content:
Word up Mark... something may have gone wrong in installation:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
Thx for the feedbacks

title: A work of art at best

author: Blake Derksen
comment: Could be great, but why is it that the night setting, less details, changing the hands all don't work? Also the ambient mode is nothing like the picture.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Blake, are you changing all these settings from the watch itself? Although its possible, if you experience issues i recommend using the settings from the phone app, it has a faster response time for heavy customization. Email me some screenshot of your  ambient mode so i can make sure its working fine. Thx for the feedback!

title: Doesn't all work

author: Mark Davis
comment: I own a few watch faces by this designer and they are all outstanding. If you have a moto 360 you won't be disappointed..very impressed. Keep up the great designs m8..;) you might want to add a digital time at the 6 o'clock position with the same layout and colour as the weather at 12.& also might want to add phone battery % under watch one Would be the nuts!!!! ;) hope you could give it ago...? Very impressive so far.. ;)

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Mark, and thanks for the comments. Yep there's still development going on with this watch face, ill make sure to show the amazing craftsmanship you'd expect. Stay tuned!
